    • Uses of MimetypeDetectionBuilder in fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.mimetype

      Classes in fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.mimetype that implement MimetypeDetectionBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MimetypeDetectionBuilderDelegate<P>
      Implementation that just delegates all operations to another builder.
      class  SimpleMimetypeDetectionBuilder<P>
      Builds a FallbackMimeTypeProvider: If SimpleMimetypeDetectionBuilder.tika() has been called, then registers Tika as main mimetype detector If SimpleMimetypeDetectionBuilder.defaultMimetype(String...) has been called, then registers a fallback to provide a default mimetype if none of the previously registered detectors could detect mimetype If no detector has been registered a BuildException is thrown (mimetype detection is required by many Ogham components If only one detector is registered, the FallbackMimeTypeProvider is not used and instead the alone detector is directly used
      Methods in fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.mimetype that return MimetypeDetectionBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MimetypeDetectionBuilder<P> MimetypeDetectionBuilder.defaultMimetype(String... mimetype)
      If no previously registered mimetype detector could determine mimetype, use a default value.
      Methods in fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.mimetype that return types with arguments of type MimetypeDetectionBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ReplaceMimetypeBuilder<MimetypeDetectionBuilder<P>> SimpleMimetypeDetectionBuilder.replace() 
      ReplaceMimetypeBuilder<MimetypeDetectionBuilder<P>> MimetypeDetectionBuilder.replace()
      Configures mimetype replacement.
      ReplaceMimetypeBuilder<MimetypeDetectionBuilder<P>> MimetypeDetectionBuilderDelegate.replace() 
      TikaBuilder<MimetypeDetectionBuilder<P>> SimpleMimetypeDetectionBuilder.tika() 
      TikaBuilder<MimetypeDetectionBuilder<P>> MimetypeDetectionBuilder.tika()
      Enable mimetype detection using Apache Tika.
      TikaBuilder<MimetypeDetectionBuilder<P>> MimetypeDetectionBuilderDelegate.tika()
